tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_workflows (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT,
  workflow_status TEXT,
  approval_status TEXT,
  trigger_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE approvals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    approver_name VARCHAR(100),
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    project_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_project_id FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE approvals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    approved_by VARCHAR(255),
    approval_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_task_id FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE workflows (
    workflow_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workflow_name VARCHAR(255),
    tasks_assigned INT,
    approval_required BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT chk_tasks_assigned CHECK (tasks_assigned > 0),
    CONSTRAINT chk_approval_required CHECK (approval_required IN (TRUE, FALSE))
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    project_manager VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE task_approvals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    approval_date TIMESTAMP,
    approver VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
)

CREATE TABLE triggers (
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_id INT,
    trigger_condition TEXT,
    trigger_action TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
)

CREATE TABLE stored_procedures (
    procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(255),
    procedure_description TEXT
)
